body: Hi, I just need a quick answer I already emailed the avicus support thing on gmail but is that where we should do it? Im sorry for this lame post but just need a quick answer.
body_tagged: Hi, I just need a quick answer I already emailed the avicus support thing on gmail but is that where we should do it? Im sorry for this lame post but just need a quick answer.
title: Help?

replies.body:
Go here https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50 and make a new discussion.

I would reccommend following the guidelines than can be found on that link as well.

replies.body:
Just as JJTheGuy said, create an appeal there. Then just wait. It takes a few days. You can't except it to be appealed in 2 hours.


If you posted something at https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50, then you DON'T need to email Avicus.
And if you need it for something else, it's support@avicus.net

replies.body:
The support email is support@avicus.net and it is alright to use gmail. You just email them with your concern and one of the seniors will get back to you.

Im going to lock this discussion to prevent further spam.

Locking....
